Articles.Content:
This thing keeps happening with BD Armory but it says that I have to install a module manager. I've searched how to install it and I checked to see if the module manager was in my folders and it was. I'm kind of confused since the game still says I don't have a module manager. Please help.

 

Edit: I downloaded the mod from CKAN

Edited April 20, 2019 by Kerbalism
